CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Product2.Product_Category__c, "Software") && (ISPICKVAL(Product2.QuantityUnitOfMeasure, "MWp") || ISPICKVAL(Product2.QuantityUnitOfMeasure, "Site")) , "1", IF(ISPICKVAL(Product2.Product_Services__c, "Implementation") && ISPICKVAL(Product2.QuantityUnitOfMeasure, "Site") && ISPICKVAL( SBQQ__QuoteLine__r.SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__Account__r.Uses_MSA_of__r.Invoicing_Terms_Services__c, "In advance"), "4", IF(ISPICKVAL(Product2.Product_Services__c, "Implementation") && ISPICKVAL(Product2.QuantityUnitOfMeasure, "Site") && ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__QuoteLine__r.SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__Account__r.Uses_MSA_of__r.Invoicing_Terms_Services__c, "In arrears"), "3", "") ))
CustomField.label: Rate Plan for billing to NS
